Uses of Package
org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.voiceconsolecommandextension  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice 
    Class and Description
    KSEvent
    A tagging interface for keyword spotting events.
    KSException
    General purpose keyword spotting exception
    KSListener
    The listener interface for receiving KSEvent events.
    KSService
    This is the interface that a keyword spotting service has to implement.
    KSServiceHandle
    An handle to a KSService
    STTEvent
    A tagging interface for speech-to-text events.
    STTException
    General purpose STT exception
    STTListener
    The listener interface for receiving STTEvent events.
    STTService
    This is the interface that a speech-to-text service has to implement.
    STTServiceHandle
    An handle to a STTService
    TTSException
    General purpose TTS exception
    TTSService
    This is the interface that a text-to-speech service has to implement.
    Voice
    This is the interface that a text-to-speech voice has to implement.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.voiceconsolecommandextension 
    Class and Description
    TTSService
    This is the interface that a text-to-speech service has to implement.
